content: तिलकः [तिल्-क्वुन्, तिल इवार्थे स्वल्पे वा कन् वा] {@--1@} A species of tree with beautiful flowers; आक्रांता तिलकक्रियापि तिलकैर्लीनद्विरेफांजनैः <ls>M. 3. 5</ls>; न खलु शोभयति स्म वनस्थलीं न तिलकस्तिलकः प्रमदामिव <ls>R. 9. 41.</ls> {@--2@} A freckle or natural mark under the skin. {@--3@} The sesamum tree. --कः , --कं {@--1@} A mark made with sandalwood or unguents &c.; मुखे मधुश्रीस्तिलकं प्रकाश्य <ls>Ku. 3. 30</ls>; कस्तूरिकातिलकमालि विधाय सायं <ls>Bv. 2. 4</ls>: <ls n="Bv.">1. 121.</ls> {@--2@} The ornament of anything (used at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘best’, ‘chief’ or ‘distinguished’); जीवलोक° <ls>Māl. 9. 21</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 105.</ls> {@--3@} The burden of a song (ध्रुवक). --का A kind of necklace. --कं {@--1@} The bladder. {@--2@} The lungs. {@--3@} A kind of salt. {@--4@} A kind of disease, the appearance of dark spots on the skin without any inflammation. {@--5@} Alliteration.
